thread.title: UBC students have epic snowball fight
thread.title_full: UBC students have epic snowball fight

author: cbc
title: UBC students have epic snowball fight
text:
You could gripe about the snow that has fallen once again in Vancouver ... or ... you could have an epic snowball fight!
UBC students organized the campus-wide event on Monday. The city got walloped with snow all weekend, meaning there was more than enough powder for the hundreds who showed up to play. 

Hold your fire! #snowballfight to get underway at #ubc #vancouver campus pic.twitter.com/ZolHPcnnVA 
— @Meerakati "You almost never get snow around here, especially in February, so it's great," said Sydney Francis, one of the students who joined in the fun.

#ubc #snowball fight now underway pic.twitter.com/2JkjMgn028 
— @Meerakati Shawn Esquven skipped a math tutorial for the snowball fight.
"It seems like a better use of my time," he said with a wide grin. 
Watch the video in the player
